backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining entities for jobs, candidates, interviews, clients, users, and admin‑gated profile access with map‑based state and authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented admin‑gate and error‑handling features with linked files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files detailing their roles in navigation, CRUD pages, utilities, and global styles.
frontend/index.css: Empty or placeholder stylesheet for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining the root mount point, favicon, metadata, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and applies an admin‑only access gate, showing login or access‑denied screens when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an admin‑only access denial message with a logout button that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding and a user dropdown showing profile info, role, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper combining header, sidebar, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation listing main routes with active‑state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper ensuring a user is authenticated and profile is loaded before rendering children, otherwise showing login or loading state.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty‑state component supporting illustration, icon, description, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A dialog component that collects name and email, validates input, and saves the user profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured React Query cache keys for users, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and context management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateC: Form page for creating a new candidate, validating input and submitting via createCandidate before navigating to the detail page.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateD: Displays detailed candidate information, job data, and status with navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateE: Loads an existing candidate, populates a form for editing, validates input, and updates the record.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/Candidates: Shows a searchable, filterable list of candidates with options to view, edit, and delete.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientCreateP: Form page for creating a new client with validation and submission including staffing requirements.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientDetailP: Displays client details, contact info, status, job openings, and staffing requirements with navigation and edit actions.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientEditPag: Provides a form to edit client information, validate inputs, update data, and navigate back to the client detail page.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientsListPa: Lists all clients with search, filtering, view/edit/delete actions, and an option to create new clients.
frontend/src/pages/clients/components/St: Allows adding, editing, and removing staffing requirement strings in a form.
Displays a read‑only list of staffing requirements or an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying job, candidate, interview, and client statistics with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewC: Form for scheduling a new interview, validating input, converting date/time, and submitting to create the record.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewD: Shows interview details, associated candidate/job info, status, and notes with navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewE: Displays and edits an interview, loading existing data, validating input, and submitting updates via API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/Interviews: Lists all interviews with status filtering, candidate lookup, and delete confirmation functionality.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobCreatePage.ts: Provides a form to create a new job opening with validation and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed job information including client, salary, status, and description with an edit action.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobEditPage.tsx: Loads an existing job opening into a form for editing, validates fields, and submits updates to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobsListPage.tsx: Renders a job openings list with search, status filtering, navigation, and deletion using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page allowing users to sign in via Internet Identity with a styled UI.
frontend/src/utils/candidateStatusPresen: Maps candidate status values to badge presentation variants and labels with safe fallbacks.
Detects authorization-related backend errors by checking common denial messages.
frontend/src/utils/optionalSelect.ts: Provides sentinel-based mapping helpers to safely handle optional shadcn Select values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and plugins for the app UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, architectural notes, and known issues for the app.
